altername_name: On a Weird Way!! Pole's Big Adventure
name: Chindōchū!! Pōru no Daibōken
overview: This is a parody of platforming games and videogames in general. It's full of secrets, jokes and try&error-traps that aren't meant to be serious. Old-school gameplay and audiovisuals make this a charming title and for only 500 Wii Points many are really curious about this one!
